text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly advises filing first (or responding immediately with counterclaims) to frame the issue as a breach of contract, control timing, present first, and prevent German court litigation. Specifically, under 'Immediate Response to ICC Notice,' it advises filing counterclaims immediately to frame the issue as wrongful termination/breach, and under 'Anti-German Court Tactics,' it advises sending a cease-and-desist or applying for an Anti-Suit Injunction (ASI) to prevent German court litigation. This directly addresses all components of the criterion: framing the issue (breach of contract), controlling timing (filing first/immediate response), presenting first (filing counterclaims), and preventing German court litigation (ASI threat/application).", "criterion_id": "b3b4595a-b14f-442f-84fc-b1ac2fc6c311"}
